caption.p: Minimum Inhibitory Concentration (MIC) of norfloxacin alone or in the presence of O. odorífera or safrole against the multiresistant strains E. coli 06, S. aureus 10 and P. aeruginosa 24. **** p < 0.0001 indicates significant differences between groups. Statistical significance was determined by one-way ANOVA and Bonferroni’s post-hoc test.
